field.name: prefixCode
field.label: Prefix Code
field.description: Prefix Code allow you to prepend HTML tags or texts to the Link ID output.

field.name: suffixCode
field.label: Suffix Code
field.description: Prefix Code allow you to append HTML tags or texts to the Link ID output.
